tool_description: This is a simple QR code generator with options to add color and or host your generated QR code images in the cloud with sharable URL
name: Hosted QR Code Generator
title: Hosted QR Code Generator

api_list.name: /api/v1/generate-color-qrcode
api_list.description: generates a colored qr and returns it as base64 encoded URI
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hosted-qr-code-generator.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/generate-color-qrcode"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hosted-qr-code-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /api/v1/generate-qrcode

api_list.name: /api/v1/generate-qrcode-hosted
api_list.description: generates a qr and hosts in the cloud and gives back URL to the hosted file
api_list.code:

url = "https://hosted-qr-code-generator.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/generate-qrcode-hosted"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

        }
